title: Blissful Adults-Only Country Retreat on NSW's Mid North Coast with Daily Breakfast
description:
Let serenity find you at the blissfully secluded Laurina Estate, a charming adults-only country retreat in the heart of New South Wales’ Mid North Coast. Easily reachable from Port Macquarie or Newcastle in under two hours by car, this is the perfect destination for a relaxing escape filled with outdoor adventures and good wines.

Whether you are travelling as a couple or a group of friends, you will have exclusive access to this property and its surrounding gardens, ensuring an undisturbed escape from reality, where your only neighbours are alpacas and nature. Your country retreat includes daily cooked breakfast and a bottle of wine on arrival.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Pick a Group Upgrade package for four people.

title: Grand Opening: New South Wales Laidback Mid North Coast Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the beauty and laidback charm of the New South Wales Mid North Coast with a stay at the brand-new Club Old Bar Motel - an inviting coastal oasis offering an excellent location and modern facilities, including a bistro, bar and gymnasium. Only steps from Old Bar's beautiful white sands and near boutiques and cafés, this contemporary sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for exploring the vibrant region.

A short walk from Old Bar Beach and Old Bar Main Street, and just 60 minutes from Port Macquarie and 120 minutes from Newcastle, this is a stylish home-away-from-home, where you can rest in complete comfort after long days spent exploring.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start the day with a delicious daily continental breakfast
- Have some fun with daily complimentary mini-golf for two
- Complimentary drink per person, per stay (glass of wine, beer or soft drink)
- Enjoy members' prices on food and drinks at Club Old Bar
- Start your escape sooner with 1pm early check-in (subject to availability)
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with 11am late checkout (subject to availability)

**Executive Upgrade**: Drift away in the luxurious Executive Room with dreamy king bedding, a private step-out balcony and indoor table and seating area.
offer_address: 46 Waterman St, Old Bar NSW 2430 Australia
